content.rendered:
In 2023, Millennium welcomed 110 summer interns globally across three regions and seven cities, integrating into our core infrastructure and technology teams. This cohort was selected from a strong applicant pool representing 60 colleges and universities from around the world.

This year we launched our internship program in Tel Aviv, and we have grown our Miami and Dublin internship programs.

Our interns spent the summer connecting with each other, learning new skills and integrating into their cities. They heard from our leadership team as a part of the Intern Speaker Series. Some even cheered on their cities’ sports teams and joined in on community initiatives, such as packing wellness kits for a family resource center to give back to their communities.

Are you eager to work side-by-side with industry professionals, get hands on training and make an impact?

Learn more about our opportunities for students
